articles.description: Staff at St. Joseph Hospital and UC Irvine Medical Center will be some of the earliest in the county to get inoculated with the Pfizer vaccine; doses of the Moderna vaccine are expected soon.
articles.content: With the sleeves of their hospital scrubs rolled up, more than a dozen medical workers helped usher in what Orange County Health Officer Dr. Clayton Chau called the beginning of the end of COVID-19 b… [+10782 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Alaskan health worker stable after allergic reaction to Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine - Reuters
articles.description: An Alaskan health worker had a serious allergic reaction after getting Pfizer Inc and BioNTech's coronavirus vaccine, but is now stable, public health authorities said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: Maine shatters daily record with 551 new cases of COVID-19 - Kennebec Journal and Morning Sentinel
articles.description: Dr. Nirav Shah, director of the Maine CDC, says the state is now 'squarely seeing' the impact of Thanksgiving gatherings.
articles.content:
Maine shattered its daily record with 551 new cases of COVID-19 reported Wednesday, just one day after front-line health care workers received the first vaccines in Maine.
